pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculates Bounds for the Selection Bias for Binary Treatment and Outcome Variables // Computes bounds and sensitivity parameters as part of sensitivity analysis for selection bias. Two bounds are provided: the SV (Smith and VanderWeele) bound and the AF (assumption-free) bound. The SV bound assumes an additional dependence structure in form of a generalized M-structure whereas the AF bound holds for general assumptions in the potential outcomes framework. See Smith and VanderWeele (2019) doi:10.1097/EDE.0000000000001032 and Zetterstrom and Waernbaum (2022) doi:10.1515/em-2022-0108.
